forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind this evening with thunderstorms likely by morning. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 9C. SW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly overnight. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 49F. SW winds at 25 to 35 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Then remaining mainly cloudy. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low 9C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 49F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with thundershowers following a period of rain early. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 11C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain early with showers and perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 51F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low around 45F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy early with rain developing later in the day. High 12C. SSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy early with rain developing later in the day. High 53F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 11C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 51F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 55F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 57F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
